summary:
BitFine.org - Welcome to BitFine.org - Your Ultimate Crypto Staking Platform

 Community Smart Contract - Version 1.0.0 @Solidity Complie 0.8.20
CA: 0x07D675Fa3C17259E6F2999A998ec099Ae27aeee1

 Tokenomics - Deposit and Earning
Deposit as little as 0.25 BNB to start earning lucrative rewards. giving you full control over your investment strategy.

Profit Potential
Earn up to 200% profit on your staked assets through our transparent and rewarding ROI structure. Daily returns range from 0.3% to 2%, providing a consistent and attractive income stream.

Unlock Multi-Level Rewards
Participate in our 5-level referral program and amplify your earnings by inviting others to join BitFine.org. Here's how it works

Highest Referral Reward
We're allocating of all deposit amounts to our revolutionary DApp. The DApp will be used to enhance the rewards for our highest referrer each period. The more you refer, the higher the potential rewards in BNB!

 Secure Custodial - BitFine.org employs cutting-edge custodial services to safeguard your assets. We've partnered with industry-leading custodians to provide an additional layer of protection, ensuring that your investments are in safe hands.

 Value Correlation - The value of BitFine Token is intricately linked to the total deposits on our platform, ensuring that every contribution adds value to your holdings.

 Blockchain Technology - Powered by cutting-edge blockchain technology, our platform ensures the security and transparency of your investments. All transactions are recorded on the blockchain, providing you with real-time visibility into your staking activities.

 Intuitive Dashboard - Our user-friendly interface simplifies the staking process. Monitor your staking portfolio, track rewards, and make informed decisions through our intuitive dashboard.
proposal:
Hello BitFine.org community! 👋

Did you know that the term 'BitFine' can also mean 'a bit of fun'? Well, we're here to add a bit of fun to your crypto journey, while also helping you to amplify your earnings. 

We've thoroughly admired your project, especially your commitment to providing lucrative rewards and ensuring the security of your community's investments. We noticed that you're using BNB as your primary token. We're a shop of B2B tools that can help you to expand your platform even further, aligning our tools to your vision. 

1. 🔄 DEX (UNI FACTORY)
   - Create your DEX based on Uniswap V2.
   - Commission: 0.00% to 20%.
   - Price: $0 - revenue share (you have not to pay)
   - Editable: Colors, logo, menus, fees, tokenlist.

2. 🎰 Lottery
   - Blockchain-based lottery; earn 0-30% commission.
   - Supported Blockchains: ETH, BSC, Polygon.
   - Supported tokens: ERC20 (BEP20).
   - Admin Controls: Start/Finish lottery, set fees.
   - Price: $0 - revenue share (you have not to pay)

And many more tools that can be tailored to your needs!

By integrating our tools, you can offer your community more ways to earn and interact with your platform. And the best part? You don't have to pay upfront. It's all revenue share, so you only pay when your community earns. 

Remember, you're not playing, you're creating. Interested in making your platform a bit more 'BitFine'? Let's chat! 👋

Check out our demos here: https://t.me/onoutdemos
